    • create

      public static SpigotCocoaBoard create(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String objectiveId, net.apartium.cocoabeans.state.Observable<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> title)
      Create a new SpigotCocoaBoard with SpigotCocoaBoardFactory that will return new instance base on MinecraftVersion
      Parameters:
      player - player that scoreboard will target
      objectiveId - objective id is the id of the scoreboard objective
      title - title of the scoreboard
      Returns:
      new instance of SpigotCocoaBoard for player
